data.message:
Marshall,in Russia you are welcome!I love Rap music!I write and listen to,analyze your text!As you once were analyzed by 2pac!Your style of Rap is awesome!Dream to read from you!Although I am white,and was born in Russia,but still love American rap,when Rap music thumping my heart starts to tremble,especially about your lyrics and songs from 2pac or biggie!I think we have similarities!If you can send me a couple of your hidden light rhymes or lines!I have read them and will try to build like them!And send it to you for you to rate!I know you'll never respond,at least read!And understand how much I love rap music,once you are so eager to send you their work!I know that I'm Russian and this music is not mine!But I love Rap,like a real American!Dreaming of fitte with you!
P. S If you reply I will be great Russian rapper and I vzbudorajat the whole rap!
